replies.body: Hi Trygve, If you shatter the curve (split surfaces in smaller pieces) it will work fine. Doing this you basically help the component not to fail with offset curve on surface which is how it finds the right percentage of glazing. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/MOC7BqAcxPvE7XrRKrtrd5WfcuLxnBf5A9v4hPVjQ7hNBGRNl1YPXYAciVAzqqYk5JeB9HFNJ5ouMwdsYEoVwLKE2N*99fkk/curvedSurface_Glazing.png) Hope it helps, Mostapha PS: I still have to reply to your email. Sorry for the delay!
